div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 107px; margin-left: 82px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 213px; margin-left: 762px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 58px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: Find a volunteer that suits your need and schedule a call

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 284px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: The volunteer gets a notification about the meeting

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 510px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: The volunteer will contact you and ask you for a 250 characters description (no less!) stating what the meeting will be about.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 738px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: If the volunteer agrees to help you, she/he will send you a confirmation email.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 965px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: The meeting has not been accepted.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 207px; height: 1px; padding-top: 310px; margin-left: 510px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p: The volunteer could also ask you for this while you're scheduling the call

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
